Class MainMenuController

java.lang.Object
controllers.MainMenuController
public class MainMenuController extends Object
Main controller for the Hospital Management System (HMS). Handles user login, role-based navigation, and system initialization.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception
      Main entry point for the application. Displays the welcome page and initializes the system.
      Parameters:
      args - Command-line arguments (not used).
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during system execution.

    • login

      private static void login(String username, String password, int userType) throws Exception
      Handles the login process for staff or patients. Verifies user credentials and updates the logged-in user.
      Parameters:
      username - The username entered by the user.
      password - The password entered by the user.
      userType - The type of user (1 for Staff, 2 for Patient).
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during login or password handling.

    • LoginPage

      public static void LoginPage() throws Exception
      Displays the login page and handles user input for login.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during login or navigation.

    • WelcomePage

      public static void WelcomePage() throws Exception
      Displays the welcome page and initializes data for the system.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during data initialization.

    • navigateByRole

      private static int navigateByRole(String role) throws Exception
      Navigates the user to the appropriate role-based menu.
      Parameters:
      role - The role of the logged-in user.
      Returns:
      A numeric code representing the user's role.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during role navigation.
